name: Bag-in-Box® Merlot - Non-alcoholic beverage - 3L
description: Pierre Zéro Rouge is a fermented then dealcoholized drink made from Merlot. It reveals fragrant aromas of pleasant freshness and sweetness on the palate. name: CHAVIN ZERO Cabernet & Merlot - Dealcoholized Wine - 750ml
description: Chavin Zéro launches its first range of de-alcoholized Vin De France, merging innovation and French winemaking tradition. Treat yourself to a unique experience if you're looking to savor wine without the effects of alcohol, while preserving the complex nuances and authentic aromas of a selection of French grape varieties. With low-calorie options and no added flavors, Chavin Zéro revolutionizes wine tasting, making moderation and sensory experience possible.

name: PIERRE ZERO Merlot - Non-alcoholic beverage - 750ml
description: Discover a complete and elegant alcohol-free range, Pierre Zéro. The dealcoholized wines Pierre Zéro allow those who do not consume alcohol to regain the notion of conviviality around a glass. Pierre Zéro Merlot captivates with its lightness combined with its aromatic power.

name: CHAVIN ZERO Syrah - Non-alcoholic beverage - 75cl
description: Discover Chavin Zéro, our new low-calorie alcohol-free wine that is perfect for those who want to indulge in a glass without worrying about the negative effects of alcohol on health. This dealcoholized Syrah wine is made from high-quality grapes and is rich in flavors, making it the ideal choice for wine enthusiasts who wish to enjoy a healthy and sophisticated beverage. The Pierre Chavin Zéro range offers a shelf life of 3 years, making it the perfect choice for those who want to stock up on their favorite drink. Whether you want to enjoy a glass at dinner or share a bottle with friends, Chavin Zéro will always be a delicious and healthy choice.

name: PIERRE ZERO Spritz - Non-alcoholic drink - 75cl
description: If you are looking for a non-alcoholic alternative for a party or event, or simply a refreshing drink for a hot day, the Pierre Zéro Spritz is the ideal option. name: FLORENTINA Spritz - Non-alcoholic sparkling drink 750ml
description: Florentina 0% spritz, organic effervescent non-alcoholic drink, reveals delicate bubbles that are both fine and persistent. The color is slightly pink with bright reflections. The nose has aromas of bitter orange zest and spices. The tangy yet generous flavor of orange peels in the Florentina Spritz combines with notes of spices and vanilla for a perfect balance between bitterness and sweetness.

name: FLORENTINA Bellini - Sparkling non-alcoholic beverage 750ml
description: Florentina 0% Bellini, organic non-alcoholic sparkling wine, reveals delicate bubbles that are both fine and persistent. The color is pale yellow with brilliant and silvery reflections. The nose has crisp peach aromas. The palate features a creamy and caressing mousse, revealing notes of peach, with an unmatched freshness.

name: FLORENTINA Red Fruits - Non-alcoholic sparkling beverage 750ml
description: Florentina 0% red fruits, organic non-alcoholic sparkling, reveals delicate bubbles that are both fine and persistent. The color is a pale red with brilliant reflections. The nose has crisp aromas of blackberries, blueberries, and raspberries. The palate presents a creamy and caressing mousse, revealing notes of blackberries, blueberries, and raspberries, with an unmatched complexity.
